modName: Out of my Way - Anti NPC Push mod
summary: With this mod NPC\'s wont stand in your way ever again or push you over a cliff.
descriptionHtml:
Introduction:
----------------------
Well as the title already says, i made this mod today for my personal  taste, this mod simply prevents collision with any living or dead actor, making it more easy to stuff those 10 followers in a narrow floor in some kind of creepy ancient nord burial place, i was just sick of everyone pushing me out of the way, like when you talk to someone, and suddenly you are at the other end of the incoming npc\'s pathing goal.

This mod works by deactivating the collisions on Actors with Another Actor,it should not change the game-play after all in any bad way, maybe it even opens new options, like better dodging or similar things.

And remember, if you don\'t like the way this mod works, keep it to yourself and do not use it :-)
Enjoy and if you like do not forget to endorse :-)

[youtube]pZ1rZt3A0i8[/youtube]

Installation:
------------------
Install it with NMM and activate  the .esp

Uninstall:
----------------------
Use NMM or delete the .esp
author: Keldis
